skillList.skillDesc: Amara leaps into the air and Slams the ground, dealing damage to all nearby enemies and knocking them up.
Amara gains increased Max Health.
Amara's weapon shots deal Bonus Damage based on the distance to her target. The closer the target, the greater the bonus.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Bonus Damage: up to 12.0% of damage dealt
Bonus Damage: up to 24.0% of damage dealt
Bonus Damage: up to 36.0% of damage dealt

skillList.skillDesc: Amara constantly regenerates health. The lower her health, the more powerful the regeneration. After using an Action Skill, this bonus is doubled for a few seconds.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Health Regeneration: up to +1.00% Missing Health / sec
Duration: 5 seconds

Health Regeneration: up to +2.00% Missing Health / sec
Duration: 5 seconds

Health Regeneration: up to +3.00% Missing Health / sec
Duration: 5 seconds

Health Regeneration: up to +4.00% Missing Health / sec
Duration: 5 seconds

Health Regeneration: up to +5.00% Missing Health / sec
Duration: 5 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: Amara deals increased Splash Damage, and takes reduced Splash Damage.

Whenever Amara deals damage to an enemy with her Action Skill, she adds a stack of Samsara. For every stack of Samsara, Amara gains increased Gun Damage and Health Regeneration for a few seconds. Stacks decay after a few seconds.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Gun Damage: +1.7% per enemy damaged
Health Regeneration: +1.7% of Max Health / sec. per stack
Max Samsara Stacks: 5
Duration: 20 seconds

Gun Damage: +3.3% per enemy damaged
Health Regeneration: +3.3% of Max Health / sec. per stack
Max Samsara Stacks: 5
Duration: 20 seconds

Gun Damage: +5.0% per enemy damaged
Health Regeneration: +5.0% of Max Health / sec. per stack
Max Samsara Stacks: 5
Duration: 20 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: For a few seconds after using her Action Skill, Amara's arms remain active and grant her Damage Reduction.
Converts Amara's Action Skill to Corrosive Damage.
Amara summons a line of fists that erupt from the gound, dealing damage to enemies in front of Amara.
Whenever Amara takes damage, she gains a stack of Mindfulness. For every stack of Mindfulness, Amara gains improved Shield Regeneration Delay and Movement Speed. Stacks decay after a few seconds.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Shield Regeneration Delay: -9.0%
Movement Speed: +1.4%
Max Mindfulness Stacks: 25
Duration: 5 seconds

Shield Regeneration Delay: -17.0%
Movement Speed: +2.8%
Max Mindfulness Stacks: 25
Duration: 5 seconds

Shield Regeneration Delay: -23.0%
Movement Speed: +4.2%

Duration: 5 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: Amara gains increased Melee Damage. Additionally, for a few seconds after using her Action Skill, Amara gains increased Melee Range.
Kill Skill. Killing an enemy with Amara's Action Skill grants all allies increased Movement Speed for a few seconds.
Amara's Action Skill now creates a Nova when it damages enemies, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.
Amara leaps into the air and shoots an Elemental Beam below her briefly, followed by a Slam.
Amara gains increased Max Health and Elemental Damage Resistance to her Action Skill Element.
Whenever an enemy damages Amara, she automatically throws an energy orb back at them, dealing Action Skill Elemental Damage. This skill has a short cooldown.
Whenever Amara deals melee damage to an enemy, she gains increased Action Skill Damage and increased Gun Damage for a few seconds.

When Amara enters Fight For Your Life, she immediately gains a Second Wind, restores her health, and creates an Action Skill Elemental Nova that may knock back nearby enemies. This skill has a long cooldown.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Max Health Restored: 100% of Max Health
Cooldown: 120 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: Enemies damaged by Amara's action skill become confused and temporarily attack their allies. However, Action Skill Cooldown is increased. If Amara targets an enemy with Phasegrasp, enemies near the Grasped target are confused as well.

Melee Override. Press V while aiming at an enemy to make Amara dash a short distance forward and perform a special melee strike, dealing Elemental Melee Damage. If a Blitz melee attack kills an enemy, Blitz's cooldown is immediately reset.
Amara sends forward an Astral Projection of herself, dealing damage to everything in its path.
Killing an enemy grants Amara a stack of Rush. Activating her Action Skill consumes all Rush stacks. For every stack of Rush consumed, Amara's Action Skill Damage is temporarily increased.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Max Rush Stacks: 10
Action Skill Damage: +0.9% per stack consumed
Duration: 20 seconds

Max Rush Stacks: 10
Action Skill Damage: +1.8% per stack consumed
Duration: 20 seconds

Max Rush Stacks: 10
Action Skill Damage: +2.7% per stack consumed
Duration: 20 seconds

Action Skill Damage: +3.6% per stack consumed
Duration: 20 seconds

Max Rush Stacks: 10
Action Skill Damage: +4.5% per stack consumed
Duration: 20 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: Amara gains increased Accuracy and Critical Hit Damage for a few seconds after activating her Action Skill.
Amara gains increased Action Skill Cooldown Rate.
A portion of all damage dealt by Amara's Action Skill is returned to her or a nearby ally as health.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Life Steal: 30% of Skill damage dealt

skillList.skillDesc: Amara sends forward an Astral Projection of herself, dealing damage to everything in its path. Whenever Amara's Astral Projection damages an enemy or object, it releases homing Elemental Projectiles that trigger her Action Skill Elemental Effect on enemies.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Cooldown: 28 seconds
Damage: 86
Elemental Projectiles: 3 per enemy hit

skillList.skillDesc: All Action Skill Augments gain increased effects.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Soul Sap Lifesteal: +20%
Allure Radius: +100%
Glamour Duration: +50%
Stillness of Mind: Breaks 0.75 seconds after being damaged
Revelation Damage: +25%

skillList.skillDesc: Enemies damaged by Amara's Action Skill become phaselocked until they are damaged or the duration ends. However, Action Skill Cooldown is increased. If Amara targets an enemy with Phasegrasp, enemies near the Grasped target are phaselocked.
Amara sends forward an Astral Projection of herself, dealing damage to everything in its path. Astral Projection deals increased damage for every enemy it hits.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Cooldown: 30 seconds
Damage Bonus: +50% per enemy hit
Damage: 88

skillList.skillDesc: Amara gains improved Fire Rate and Charge Time.
Enemies take increased damage from all sources for a few seconds after being damaged by Amara's Action Skill.
Amara gains increased Gun Damage. This effect is increased after she activates her action skill for a few seconds.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Gun Damage: +6.7%
Gun Damage: +6.7% after action skill use
Duration: 8 seconds

Gun Damage: +13.3% after action skill use
Duration: 8 seconds

Gun Damage: +20.0% after action skill use

skillList.skillDesc: When Amara kills an enemy with a Gun or Action Skill, she creates a homing projectile that seeks out a new enemy dealing her Action Skill Elemental Damage.
Amara's Rush stacks gain increased effectiveness.
Amara sends forward an Astral Projection of herself. When it hits a target, it explodes, damaging all nearby enemies.

Amara's Action Skill can be activated while it's cooling down. This skill can only be used once per completed cooldown. Additionally, increases Amara's Max Rush Stacks. Additionally, if Amara's Action Skill kills an enemy, it refunds half of her Rush stacks.
Amara summons a giant fist that bursts from the ground and locks the targeted enemy in place for a few seconds. Some enemies are immune to being Grasped and instantly take damage instead.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Skill Duration: 7 seconds
Cooldown: 16 seconds
Grasp Immune Damage: 28

skillList.skillDesc: Amara gains increased Weapon Handling and Accuracy.
Convert a portion of damage dealth by Amara's weapons into her Action Skill Element.
Amara gains increased Elemental Damage. Shock damage is further increased.
Amara gains increased Melee Damage and her Melee Damage is converted to her Action Skill Element.
Whenever Amara applies a Status Effect to an enemy, it has a chance to spread to a nearby enemy.
Converts Amara's Action Skill to Incendiary Damage.
Amara summons a giant fist that bursts from the ground and locks the targeted enemy in place for a few seconds. Whenever the Grasped enemy is killed, a new fist seeks out and Grasps a new target.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Bonus Targets: Up to +4
Cooldown: 20 seconds
Grasp Immune Damage: 28

skillList.skillDesc: Amara's Gun Damage is increased for a few seconds after an enemy is Grasped. Whenever any player kills a Grasped enemy, their current weapon is instantly reloaded.
Amara's Action Skill creates a singularity that pulls in enemies.

Amara's bullets that damage enemies have a chance to ricochet and deal decreased damage to other nearby enemies. Ricochet Chance and Damage are increased if the target is currently affected by Phasegrasp or Stillness of Mind.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Ricochet Chance: 10%
Ricochet Damage: -50%

skillList.skillDesc: Amara gains increased Magazine Size with elemental weapons.

Whenever Amara triggers an elemental effect on an enemy, when that enemy dies that enemy explodes, dealing her attuned elemental damage along with any other element that is currently inflicted upon that enemy. This skill has a short cooldown.

Amara summons a giant fist that bursts from the ground and locks the targeted enemy in place for a few seconds. Enemies near the Grasped target are linked, and any damage dealt to a linked target is shared between all other linked targets.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Link Damage: 35% of damage dealt
Cooldown: 18 seconds
Grasp Immune Damage: 34

skillList.skillDesc: Amara summons a giant fist that bursts from the ground and locks the targeted enemy in place for a few seconds. After Grasping the targeted enemy, large fists appears and constantly smash the area, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
Amara gains Life Steal whenever she deals Elemental Damage with her weapon.
Whenever Amara applies a Status Effect to an enemy, she gains a chance to randomly Electrocute, Ignite, or Melt that enemy.
Amara's guns deal Bonus Elemental Damage, based on her Action Skill Element.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Bonus Elemental Damage: 18.0% of Damage Dealt
